Burglars strike at Hospice shop in Gisborne https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/08/01/burglars-strike-at-hospice-shop-in-gisborne/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/08/01/burglars-strike-at-hospice-shop-in-gisborne/ Murray Robertson'I went to unlock the paddock on the gate and the whole gate fell on top of me': Manager Wed, 31 Jul 2024 17:00:00 +0000 The Hospice Tairāwhiti charity shop in Peel St was targeted by burglars, who took the mesh door to a storage area at the rear off its hinges to get inside. The door fell on unsuspecting shop manager Brenda Kinder when she went to unlock it yesterday morning. Photo / Murray Robertson
